item.title: Protecting against indirect prompt injection attacks in MCP
item.description: In this blog post, we will provide some guidelines on how to mitigate prompt injection attacks in Model Context Protocol (MCP) and share the steps Microsoft has taken to address emerging risks such as this one for our customers. MCP is an open protocol spearheaded by Anthropic that defines a standardized interface for connecting Large [‚Ä¶] Link to article: https://devblogs.microsoft.com/blog/protecting-against-indirect-injection-attacks-mcp

item.title: Predictable LLM results with Structured Output and sp_invoke_external_rest_endpoint
item.description: OpenAI recently introduced a powerful new feature for developers: structured output using JSON Schema via the response_format parameter. This makes it possible to request responses from a GPT-4o model that strictly match a given schema‚Äîno free-text, no guesswork. If you‚Äôre working with Azure SQL, this is a game-changer.
